main.text: I am ultimate software developer. I like to create services that can help people. I have tried quite wide range of technologies in order to learn it.  I am focused at Node.js ecosystem, but it is not my limit.

skills.text: I am constantly exercising my skills and learning new technologies to do my job more efficiently.

education.text: All my life I have been driven by my strong belief that education is important. I try to learn something new every single day.

history.description: BС in Information Systems and Technology in Business and Industry. Now I am studying in the 4th year.
Learn the fundamentals of digital marketing to help your business or career.
Mastered product development in a team with a manager, analysts, backend developers, and other frontend developers. Improved skills in developing web clients with Vue.js and VueX.
